title: Orientation Week - Welcome Session
description: Welcome session for new students. Introduction to DSUTD and campus facilities.

title: Academic Planning Workshop
description: Workshop on course selection and academic planning for the upcoming semester.

title: Student Club Fair
description: Meet representatives from various student clubs and organizations.

title: Safety Briefing

description: Introduction to career services and internship opportunities.
